items.name: shiny stone
items.description: A smooth, grey stone that catches the light in an interesting way. You feel it might be magical.

items.name: old map
items.description: A brittle parchment marked with faint ink lines. It shows paths through the forest and hints of underground tunnels.

items.name: rusty key
items.description: A corroded key covered in greenish rust. It might still open an ancient lock somewhere.

items.name: silver sword
items.description: A gleaming sword etched with lunar symbols. It hums faintly when danger is near.

items.name: torch
items.description: A wooden torch wrapped with cloth. Useful for lighting dark areas when ignited.

items.name: golden crown
items.description: A crown encrusted with emeralds and rubies. It radiates both beauty and authority.

items.name: health potion
items.description: A small crystal vial filled with red liquid that restores your vitality.

items.name: ancient tome
items.description: A heavy book filled with runes. Some pages glow faintly under torchlight.

items.name: fishing rod
items.description: A simple yet sturdy rod. Its line looks strong enough to haul more than just fish.

items.name: rope
items.description: A long, thick rope made of hemp. Perfect for climbing or tying objects.

items.name: crystal orb
items.description: A translucent sphere that reveals faint visions when held close. It hums with mysterious energy.

items.name: emerald amulet
items.description: An amulet with a glowing green gem. It feels warm to the touch.

rooms.name: Forest Clearing
rooms.description: You stand in a quiet clearing surrounded by towering pines. Birds sing overhead. Paths lead north toward a village, east to a dark cave, and south to a shimmering lake.

rooms.name: Cave Entrance
rooms.description: The mouth of a shadowy cave yawns before you. A cool breeze carries the scent of earth and mystery. The forest lies west, and a narrow tunnel stretches north.

rooms.name: Dark Tunnel
rooms.description: The tunnel is damp and cold. The walls glisten with moisture, and faint echoes of dripping water fill the silence. A weak glow flickers further north.

rooms.name: Underground Chamber
rooms.description: A vast chamber with walls carved by ancient hands. Moss covers the stone, and a locked iron door stands to the east.

rooms.name: Hidden Vault
rooms.description: A secret vault glows with torchlight. Chests of gold and relics line the walls, though some look recently disturbed. The only way out is west.

rooms.name: Village Outskirts
rooms.description: A quiet dirt path leads into a small farming village. Wheat fields stretch as far as the eye can see. To the south is the forest, and east lies the bustling market.

rooms.name: Village Market
rooms.description: Merchants shout their wares from colorful stalls. The scent of baked bread and roasted meat fills the air. A forge glows to the north, and the outskirts lie west.

rooms.name: Blacksmith Forge
rooms.description: The forge crackles with heat. Sparks fly as the blacksmith hammers steel. Tools hang from the walls, and a silver blade rests on the anvil.

rooms.name: Lakeside
rooms.description: You arrive at a tranquil lake. The water shimmers with reflections of clouds. A small wooden dock stretches into the water, and a boat rocks gently. Paths lead north and east.

rooms.name: Ancient Ruins
rooms.description: Crumbling stone pillars and broken statues mark this place of ancient worship. A staircase spirals downward into darkness.

rooms.name: Sunken Catacombs
rooms.description: You find yourself in torch-lit tunnels beneath the ruins. Bones and offerings line the walls. A narrow passage leads east.

rooms.name: Forgotten Shrine
rooms.description: An eerie shrine filled with candles that never seem to burn out. A golden statue watches you silently. The only way out is west.

rooms.name: Wizard Tower Base
rooms.description: A tall, crumbling tower stands before you. Ivy crawls up its sides. The heavy wooden door is ajar, revealing a spiral staircase.

rooms.name: Wizard Tower Library
rooms.description: Shelves overflow with books, scrolls, and strange artifacts. The scent of old parchment fills the air. A ladder leads up.

rooms.name: Observatory
rooms.description: At the towerâ€™s peak, shattered glass panels reveal the night sky. Strange brass devices track the stars. You sense the power of forgotten magic here.
